meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tree</radical> <radical>branch</radical> is exactly what it sounds like: the <kanji>branch</kanji> of a tree.
readingMnemonic: You're smelling and feeling the  <kanji>branch</kanji> when, suddenly, it starts screaming at you: "<reading>Eh, da</reading>d?" (えだ). The branch won't leave you alone. It follows you around screaming "Eh, dad?", thinking you're its long-lost tree branch father. Poor thing.
